alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 3:12PM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Northern Franklin, Northern St. Lawrence and Western Clinton Counties in New York and western Franklin County in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slick roads are likely, making for hazardous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, moderate at times, will continue through this afternoon, then quickly end this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow plenty of extra time if travel is necessary late tonight into Sunday.
